__e: Well, Nick, did you succeed in forgetting me?
I haven't stopped thinking about you since the first time I saw you.
I haven't stopped thinking about you from the first moment I saw you.
But today when I look at you and I see our child in your arms, I stop wondering and I stop being afraid.
I stopped worrying about you months ago.
I've just stopped worrying about losing something
Well, Nick, did you succeed in forgetting me?
I haven't stopped thinking about you from the first moment I saw you.
I haven't stopped thinking about you since the first time I saw you.
You know, on my way here, I stopped by the library hoping she'd be there.
Coming into town, I stopped at my father's place.
I stopped by the house and 99's mother told me you were here.
I always stopped at the last moment because I'm a coward.
I stopped on my way home and... bought something for you.
I stopped in the middle of the building and I saw the sky!
Just stopped to think that a lovely night like this and a great big moon, and a girl like...
And when I could think again, it suddenly struck me that you had known all the time.
I've been so delighted working here that I didn't think half the time.
